scripts.postinstall: (npm run build:vendor) && (npm run build:checkout) && (npm run build:twsc)
scripts.build:vendor: cd src/vendor && npm install && webpack --mode production --config webpack.config.js
scripts.build:checkout: cd src/checkout && npm install && webpack --mode production --config webpack.config.js
scripts.build:twsc: cd src/twsc && npm install && webpack --mode production --config webpack.config.js
scripts.push: cd theme && shopify theme push && cd ..
scripts.pull: cd theme && shopify theme pull --nodelete -o templates/*.json -o config/* -o locales/* && cd ..
scripts.pull-settings:uk: npm run switch:uk && cd theme && shopify theme pull --nodelete -o templates/*.json -o config/* -o locales/* && cd ..
scripts.pull-settings:ie: npm run switch:ie && cd theme && shopify theme pull --nodelete -o templates/*.json -o config/* -o locales/* && cd ..
scripts.pull-settings:fr: npm run switch:fr && cd theme && shopify theme pull --nodelete -o templates/*.json -o config/* -o locales/* && cd ..
scripts.push:uk: npm run switch:uk && npm run pull && npm run build:prod && cd theme && shopify theme push -x templates/*.json -x config/* -x locales/*
scripts.push:ie: npm run switch:ie && npm run pull && npm run build:prod && cd theme && shopify theme push -x templates/*.json -x config/* -x locales/*
scripts.push:fr: npm run switch:fr && npm run pull && npm run build:prod && cd theme && shopify theme push -x templates/*.json -x config/* -x locales/*
scripts.push-with-settings:uk: shopify switch --store=evesleep-uk.myshopify.com && npm run build:prod && cd theme && shopify theme push
scripts.push-with-settings:ie: shopify switch --store=evesleep-ie.myshopify.com && npm run build:prod && cd theme && shopify theme push
scripts.push-with-settings:fr: shopify switch --store=evesleep-fr.myshopify.com && npm run build:prod && cd theme && shopify theme push
scripts.push-new-theme:uk: shopify switch --store=evesleep-uk.myshopify.com && npm run build && cd theme && shopify theme push --unpublished
scripts.push-new-theme:ie: shopify switch --store=evesleep-ie.myshopify.com && npm run build && cd theme && shopify theme push --unpublished
scripts.push-new-theme:fr: shopify switch --store=evesleep-fr.myshopify.com && npm run build && cd theme && shopify theme push --unpublished
